article.title: MIT to Continue Running Lincoln Labs for $1.7 Billion
article.text: The Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Cambridge, Massachusetts, has been awarded a $1,734,516,083 modification (P00538) for the operation of the Lincoln Laboratory. This modificationÂ prevents a break in service for all research and development projects under the subject contract. Work will be performed at Lexington, Massachusetts, and is expected to be complete by March 31, 2018. This contract is incrementally funded; additional funds are not being obligated at time of award. The Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity (FA8721-05-C-0002).
